title: Road Race
description: A mass-start race where all riders start together and race to the finish line.
validation: Validate that competitors meet the required age and category. Ensure course safety regulations are acknowledged.

title: Individual Time Trial (ITT)
description: A race against the clock where riders start individually at set intervals.
validation: Validate the starting intervals between competitors. Ensure competitors have ITT-specific equipment.

title: Team Time Trial (TTT)
description: A race against the clock where teams start at set intervals and the team's time is taken when a specific number of riders cross the finish line.
validation: Validate team composition (e.g., minimum and maximum number of riders). Ensure teams have TTT-specific equipment.

title: Cyclo-cross
description: A race held on a short course featuring various types of terrain, including grass, mud, and obstacles.
validation: Validate course obstacles and terrain specifications. Ensure competitors have cyclo-cross-specific equipment.

title: Track Cycling
description: Racing on a velodrome track, including various events like sprints, pursuit, and points races.
validation: Validate track regulations (e.g., bike specifications, rider positions). Ensure competitors comply with track-specific safety rules.

title: Mountain Bike
description: Off-road racing on rough terrain, including cross-country and downhill events.
validation: Validate the course difficulty and terrain type. Ensure competitors have mountain bike-specific equipment.

title: BMX
description: Short, intense races on dirt tracks with jumps and sharp turns.
validation: Validate track and jump specifications. Ensure competitors have BMX-specific safety gear.
